page.title: Weapon Color Modules
page.text: All energy weapons including the [item name=phaser], [item name=phaser_rifle] and the [item name=omni_tool] can be customized with modules. One of those module types is the weapon color module.

The weapon color modules can change the weapon's appearance by changing it's color. The can also change the beam color of the [item name=phaser] and the [item name=omni_tool] as well as the color of the plasma bolts fired by the [item name=phaser_rifle] and the [item name=omni_tool].
The color module can only be found in dungeon chests and cannot be replicated nor crafted.
